snippet: The lawsuits, which seek to eliminate limitations on N.C.A.A. scholarships, can proceed as class actions, a federal judge ruled.
abstract: Federal Judge Claudia Wilken rules that two lawsuits seeking to eliminate limitations on NCAA scholarships can proceed as class actions.
lead_paragraph: The lawsuits, which seek to eliminate limitations on N.C.A.A. scholarships, can proceed as class actions, a federal judge ruled.

headline.main: Step Forward for Two Suits Filed Against the N.C.A.A.
headline.print_headline: Step Forward for Two Suits Filed Against the N.C.A.A.
